name: RESTMO Water Flow Meter with Brass Inlet Metal Thread, Measure Gallon/Liter Consumption and Flow Rate for Outdoor Garden Hose Watering, RV Water Tank Filling, Lawn Sprinkler and Nozzle Sprayer
short_description: Pure Brass Inlet & Metal Thread: Durable heavy-duty brass construction ensures exceptional durability and effortless installation or removal.

Equipped with an easy-to-read LCD screen and one-touch control push button, this water flow meter can easily display and track the water usage & flow rate of your outdoor garden hose with 4 different measurement modes.

Short press the button to change the mode: Flow Mode: real-time water flow rate; Consumption Mode: last-time water usage; Average Mode: daily average water usage of a week (count from next day); Total Mode: total water usage.

Long press the button at flow mode to switch the unit (US gallon to liter). Reset data when long press the button at other modes. The LCD screen goes to sleep automatically if there is no operation in 1 minute.
Built-in with hall type sensor and IC chipset, which provide more accurate measurement and precise calculations. Ideal to measure how much amount of water are used and prevent over-watering.

Rugged design with premium heavy duty ABS material, this water meter is weatherproof and durable, great to resist UV, sunshine, and rain. The IPX6 waterproof grade ensures more stability for outdoor use.

The measurable water flow rate ranges from 0.3 to 12 GPM (1 to 45.5 LPM). For optimal meter reading, we recommend adjusting the faucet to a moderate flow rate; it is not necessary to turn it to the maximum setting.

name: GPI - 01A Series Turbine Flow Meter for Fuel, Aluminum Body with Battery Powered Digital Display, 3-30 GPM (113255-1)
short_description: What's in the Box: Digital fuel meter, rubber bumper, (2) 3/4" reducers, 3/4" x 1-1/2" pipe fitting, (2) alkaline AAA batteries, Owners Manual
Compatible with gasoline blends (up to E15), diesel fuel blends (up to B20) and kerosene. Not for use with water or chemicals.
Compact and lightweight at just 12 ounces
Mount directly to the nozzle for easy reading
Includes 3/4 in. reducer fitting and 3/4 x 1 1/2 in. pipe fitting
FM Approved to U.S. and Canadian Standards as intrinsically Safe for Class 1, Division 1 Groups D.
product_description: The GPI 01A31GM digital turbine flowmeter is made from durable cast aluminum and features an LCD display that is accurate to +/-5 percent of reading. This economical turbine meter is designed for flow rates from 3 to 30 GPM and is factory calibrated in gallons for use with diesel, gasoline or kerosene. The lightweight 01A31GM mounts easily to the end of a hose and is ideal for use with free flow gravity systems or combined with an electric transfer pump as part of a fuel transfer system. The GPI 01A31GM digital flow meter comes with two 0.75-inch reducers to work with either 1-inch or 0.75-inch line sizes, 0.75-inch MNPT pipe nipple and two standard AAA batteries.

name: Waterproof 3/4 Inch Digital Water & Fuel Flow Meter, EMI Protection, 1-13.2 GPM Inline NPT Thread Fuel Meter for Water, Diesel, Gas Oil, Gasoline, Kerosene, Methanol, and Other Liquids
short_description: True Waterproof – Diesel fuel meter is fully waterproof, ensuring accurate readings and durability in wet environments. Built to perform reliably in tough conditions, it's ideal for various demanding applications.

Versatile Unit Options - Switch between GAL (Gallons), QTS, PTS, and L units on the flowmeter to meet your specific measurement needs, offering flexibility and convenience. Flow range: 1-13 GPM (4-50 LPM), working pressure: 87 psi.

EMI Protection - The 3/4 Inch flow meter features EMI protection, preventing false readings caused by nearby pumps or motors. This ensures accurate and reliable measurements, even in environments with strong electromagnetic interference.

Digital LCD Display - The clear LCD screen of the 3/4 inch digital fuel meter shows real-time flow rates, accumulated totals, and instantaneous flow. It makes monitoring and recording your liquid usage easy. Single count range: 99999; Total cumulative count range: 29999999.

Accurate Measurements - Our diesel fuel meter provides precise readings with a high accuracy of ±1%, ensuring reliable data for liquids like water, diesel, gas oil, gasoline, kerosene, methanol, E15, and more.

Durable Build - Crafted with an aluminum alloy casing and PP turbine, this digital fuel meter is designed to withstand various environments and provide long-lasting performance. Working temperature: 14-176°F(-10°C~80°C).

name: Flow Meter 3/4 Inche Digital Turbine Flow Meter Aluminum Alloy - Fuel Meter Features Auto On & Off Industry Grade - for Water, Diesel, Gasoline Supports Gallon, QTS, PTS, L, m³ (3/4 inch)
short_description: 【High-Precision Flow Monitoring – ±1% Accuracy】Achieve dependable flow readings every time. This digital turbine flow meter delivers ±1% measurement accuracy for a wide range of liquids, including water, diesel, gasoline, kerosene, gas oil, methanol, E15, and more—ensuring trustworthy data for both work and DIY applications.

【Multiple Units & Wide Flow Range for Flexible Use】Easily switch between GAL (gallons), QTS, PTS, liters, and cubic meters to match your preferred measurement style. Designed with a flow range of 2.5–31 GPM (10–120 LPM) and a working pressure of 6 Bar, this meter adapts seamlessly to different fueling or fluid transfer setups.

【Rugged Build for Tough Conditions】Engineered with a durable aluminum alloy body and stainless-steel components, this diesel fuel meter stands up to demanding environments—from industrial sites to agricultural and off-road use. Operates reliably within -10°C to 80°C (14–176°F).

【IPX4 Splash Protection – Not for Submersion】Built with an IPX4 water-resistant design to handle incidental splashes. However, the meter should not be submerged in water, oil, or fuel. To protect the internal electronics and prolong service life, keep the display area dry and avoid exposure to rain, high humidity, or condensation.

【Auto Power Saving for Longer Battery Life】Designed with energy efficiency in mind. The display automatically powers off after 10 minutes of inactivity and wakes up instantly when flow is detected—or with a press of any button. Enjoy over 1 year of standby time, making it ideal for frequent or occasional use.

name: 1/2" NPT Digital Gear Flow Meter, ±0.5% Accuracy, 0.05–6.6 GPM, for Low-Flow, High-Viscosity Liquids, Compatible with Motor Oil, Lubricants, Antifreeze & Hydraulic Systems
short_description: MULTI-MODE DISPLAY - Gear Oil Flow Meter supports three measuring modes: Instant Flow Rate, Single Measurement Flow, and Total Accumulated Flow. The smart digital screen makes data reading faster, clearer, and more intuitive.
WIDE APPLICATION RANGE -This Gear Oil Flow Meter is designed for measuring motor oil, lubricants, transmission fluid, antifreeze, and other high-viscosity or low-flow liquids.
ANTI-ELECTROMAGNETIC INTERFERENCE - This digital gear flow meter has anti-interference capability and operates stably even near motors, welders, or high-frequency power sources.

HIGH ACCURACY - This gear oil flow meter provides ±0.5% measuring accuracy with stable and precise readings. It measures flow from 0.05–6.6 GPM (0.2–25 L/min), supports single measurement range 0.0–9999.9 and total 0.0–999999, and operates reliably from -22 °F to 158 °F (-30 °C to 70 °C).

ENERGY-SAVING DESIGN - The Gear Oil Flow Meter automatically powers off after 1 minute of inactivity to save energy and wakes when liquid flows or any key is pressed. Built-in memory retains data after power loss and supports bidirectional flow measurement.
